channel.title: nodeit changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: v0.1.1
item.description:
• Rough cut plugin API
  • Font size plugin to allow changing the font size within documents
  • Fix bug with enabling syntax highlighting for recognised document types

item.title: v0.1.0
item.description:
• Fixed dependency resolution for CodeMirror modes
  • Fix error caused by chromeTabs trying to close an already closed tab
  • Published API docs at http://alanshaw.github.io/nodeit/doc/
  • [OSX] Fixed scrollbar issues
  • [OSX] Fixed app not opening window when opening files from finder
  • [OSX] Added Sparkle for auto updates
  • [OSX] Fixed opening non ASCII files issue
